text: @SecPompeo NIH is the major sponsor of the Wuhan institute of Virology to catch bats and research of chimeric viruses for more than 10 years!! See the paper by WIV and UNC: A lab-made bat coronavirus related to SARS has been shown to infect human cells. https://t.co/5nXRIORxtQ
